resources.string: Added a function to manual backup.
Added a function to manual restore.
Added a function to provide advice based on sleep data.
Changed so that the timer time can be reset by long pressing the delete button.
Fixed a crash that could occur when switching between fragments.
Changed the notification so that it automatically disappears when the user taps the sleep time recording reminder notification.
Changed the alarm to stop automatically if the user does not stop it after 5 minutes.
Fixed an issue where the sleep data graph for the last 7 days was not displayed correctly in certain time zones and certain times.
Fixed an issue where some layouts were not displayed correctly in RTL mode.
Added a function to delete sleep time data.
Fixed an issue where the app was not working properly on some devices.
You can now check the list of recorded sleep times.
Fixed the timer sound to play correctly.
Added a function to record sleep time.
